title: Kitsune No Yomeiri (Satou Yuuko)
alternative_title: The Fox's Wedding ; 狐ノ嫁入り ; VOCALOID - The Fox's Wedding
status: The Fox's Wedding ; 狐ノ嫁入り ; VOCALOID - The Fox's Wedding
description:
Description :
        Rin and Len are older sister and younger brother, siblings in a samurai family that rules in the land of Musashi. They lived there happily with their uncle, the current clan leader. Len has started to feel guilty about Rin's wooing. Then, one day, they find out that there have been talks with the land of Owari about Len taking part in a political marriage. Rin is against losing the man she loves, while Len accepts reality. The name of the girl who holds their fates in her hand is… Miku. This is a comic adaptation of a popular Japanese rock-style Vocaloid song, created by the popular singer OSTER project and illustrated by the popular artist Chiho!
